android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST.description: Allows an application to receive packets not directly addressed to your device. This can be useful when discovering services offered nearby. It uses more power than the non-multicast mode.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to connect to and disconnect from Wi-Fi access points and to make changes to configured Wi-Fi networks.

android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to change the state of network connectivity.

android.permission.CAMERA.description: Allows application to take pictures and videos with the camera. This allows the application to collect images that the camera is seeing at any time.

android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH.description: Allows an application to view configuration of the local Bluetooth phone and to make and accept connections with paired devices.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN.description: Allows an application to configure the local Bluetooth phone and to discover and pair with remote devices.

android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS.description: Allows an application to use the account authenticator capabilities of the Account Manager, including creating accounts as well as obtaining and setting their passwords.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

manifest_analysis.title:
App has a Network Security Configuration
[android:networkSecurityConfig]
manifest_analysis.desc: The Network Security Configuration feature lets apps customize their network security settings in a safe, declarative configuration file without modifying app code. These settings can be configured for specific domains and for a specific app.
manifest_analysis.name: App has a Network Security Configuration [android:networkSecurityConfig]

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

manifest_analysis.title:
Service (com.hp.sdd.library.remote.services.tenzing.TenzingJobService) is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.
Permission: android.permission.BIND_JOB_SERVICE
[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: A Service is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to normal or dangerous, a malicious application can request and obtain the permission and interact with the component. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.
manifest_analysis.name: is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.[android:exported=true]

manifest_analysis.title: TaskAffinity is set for Activity </br>(com.urbanairship.push.NotificationProxyActivity)
manifest_analysis.desc: If taskAffinity is set, then other application could read the Intents sent to Activities belonging to another task. Always use the default setting keeping the affinity as the package name in order to prevent sensitive information inside sent or received Intents from being read by another application.
manifest_analysis.name: TaskAffinity is set for Activity

binary_analysis.title: Found elf built without Position Independent Executable (PIE) flag
binary_analysis.desc: In order to prevent an attacker from reliably jumping to, for example, a particular exploited function in memory, Address space layout randomization (ASLR) randomly arranges the address space positions of key data areas of a process, including the base of the executable and the positions of the stack, heap and libraries. Built with option -pie.
binary_analysis.file: lib/x86_64/librs.jpeg_v6_5_0.so lib/x86_64/librs.render_adjust_v6_5_1.so lib/x86_64/librs.render_sharpness_v6_5_1.so lib/x86_64/librs.render_duotone_v6_5_0.so lib/x86_64/librs.split_v6_5_0.so lib/x86_64/librs.render_clarity_v6_5_0.so lib/x86_64/librs.render_3d_lut_v6_5_0.so

file_analysis.finding: Certificate/Key files hardcoded inside the app.

playstore_details.title: HP Smart
playstore_details.description:
Print, scan, and share by using HP Smart with your HP Printer anytime, anywhere! HP Smart makes setup, printing, and scanning easier than ever!
 
· Set up and manage your HP printer directly from the app
· View printer status and send prints on the go
· Print, copy, scan, and share files directly from your mobile device to your friends, co-workers, or the cloud
· Edit and enhance your photos with filters, crop, add text, and adjustments like saturation, contrast, brightness
· Use your mobile device’s camera to create high-quality scans, then preview/edit/save them as PDFs and JPEGs and store in your favorite cloud storage account
· Order supplies and get support straight from the app
 
Some HP Smart functionality requires you to have either internet or cellular service. Certain features/software are available in English language only. For a full list of supported printers, visit: http://support.hp.com/us-en/document/c03722645?openCLC=true
playstore_details.summary: Set up, scan, print, share, and manage your HP printer.
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Set up, scan, print, share, and manage your HP printer.
playstore_details.developerAddress:
Attn: HP Inc. App Store Manager
16399 West Bernardo Dr.
MS 65-220
San Diego, CA 92127
